title: The Radio System installed on the is known as PRIMUS 2 Integ…
caption_en: The Radio System installed on the is known as PRIMUS 2 Integrated Radio System. It consists of: - 2 integrated navigation units (INU), - 2 integrated communications units (ICU), - 2 radio management units (RMU), and - 2 audio control panels.

title: The integrated navigation unit (INU) consists of: - NAV Rece…
caption_en: The integrated navigation unit (INU) consists of: - NAV Receiver Module - DME Interrogator Module - ADF Receiver Module

title: The integrated communications unit (ICU) consists of: - COM …
caption_en: The integrated communications unit (ICU) consists of: - COM Transceiver Module - Mode C Transponder

title: The has a feature to tune the radios through radio tuning un…
caption_en: The has a feature to tune the radios through radio tuning unit. The radio tuning unit is accessible by depressing the TUNE button on the The RMU controls the frequency and mode selection of the aircraft radios.

title: One clearance delivery head is used solely for selecting fre…
caption_en: One clearance delivery head is used solely for selecting frequencies on navigation receiver module in integrated navigation 1 and communications set in integrated communications unit 1.

title: These radio components are mounted on a common bus called th…
caption_en: These radio components are mounted on a common bus called the primary radio system bus. In addition to each pilot's set of radios is also connected to their respective secondary radio system buses.

title: On the pilot's side, the RMU 1, and can be used as tuning pa…
caption_en: On the pilot's side, the RMU 1, and can be used as tuning panel to select frequency to tune integrated navigation unit 1 (INU) and integrated communications unit 1 (ICU). Any frequency selected on RMU, or is transmitted through the radio system bus to the rest so that the same frequency is displayed on RMU, and

title: Similarly on the co-pilots side, integrated navigation unit …
caption_en: Similarly on the co-pilots side, integrated navigation unit 2 and integrated communications unit 2 are tuned by RMU

title: Audio control panel (ACP) is provided for controlling incomi…
caption_en: Audio control panel (ACP) is provided for controlling incoming and outgoing audio signals. It is also used to control interphone, cabin public announcement (PA), and marker beacon audiosensitivity.

title: The primary radio system bus connection provides the benefit…
caption_en: The primary radio system bus connection provides the benefit of cross-side control feature on this aircraft That is, it enables RMU to cross-tune the off-side radio components.

title: Loss of the primary radio system bus only eliminates the cro…
caption_en: Loss of the primary radio system bus only eliminates the cross-side control feature. In that event the RMUs can no longer tune the off-side radios. RMU can only be used to tuned on-side radios. However, no radio functions are lost. The radios on both sides are still fully functional through their secondary radio system buses.

title: One high frequency communication set is also installed on th…
caption_en: One high frequency communication set is also installed on the aircraft HF communication set is installed separately as itis an optional item.

title: The SELCAL system is integrated into the 1, 2 and HF communi…
caption_en: The SELCAL system is integrated into the 1, 2 and HF communication systems to relief crew from continuously monitoring the communication frequencies. The system will sound an alert and illuminate the appropriate SELCAL light when the ground contacts the aircraft.
